basic.description:
Detailed study of selected poets with special emphasis on the works of Nelligan and contemporary poets. Travaux pratiques include oral exposés and dissertations.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La Poesie Quebecoise

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     FREN221 or (FREN 212 and FREN220)
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN311; FREN333.
